item.description:
Just in case people actually want to meet there as well.

I'll reach out to them to see if we can get our own table or something.

I won't be able to make this one, only once in a while, so I would need someone else to be the primary contact/organizer. Any takers?

group.name: The Boston Dungeons & Dragons Meetup Group

item.name: The Boston Dungeons & Dragons Meetup Group Monthly Meetup (Cambridge)
